visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Sales Data, Axes and labels styling: X-axis title color: blue, Y-axis title color: green, font size for labels: 12px, Data series: Series 1 with data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4], Custom colors: Series color: #FF5733, Additional configurations: Disable legend, disable credits, set chart margins to 50px top and bottom, 100px left and right, background color: #F9F9F9.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart includes an X-axis with categories for each month and a Y-axis. The X-axis title is styled with a blue color and a font size of 12px, while the Y-axis title is styled with a green color and the same font size. The data series, named 'Series 1', contains monthly sales data with a custom color of #FF5733. The legend and credits are disabled, and the chart has custom margins and a background color of #F9F9F9. This configuration ensures a clean and visually appealing chart presentation.
